text:
🍒The short but interesting Rambutan Trail located near the Main entrance of Thomson Nature Park routes around the former Rambutan Plantation.
🍒Along the trail, vistors are treated to the ruins of the former villagers residences, with information boards to their stories and the several fruit trees around.
🍒A former Rambutan Plantation's water source can also be found at the trail.
🍒Don't miss out on this tranquil and shady trail when visiting the Nature Park.
